== Class Hierarchy ==

{{#widget: TreeResult | 
 rootNode = 
   {{ 
        query = 'SELECT DISTINCT ?class WHERE {
        <http://www.fluidops.com/AllContext> void:classPartition ?classPartition .
        ?classPartition void:class ?class .
      FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?class rdfs:subClassOf ?superClass }
      FILTER ( !isBLANK(?class) )}
      ORDER BY ASC(?class)'
   }} | 
 childNodes = 
   {{  
     {{
        predicate='rdfs:subClassOf' | 
        direction='IN'| 
     }}
   }} |
treeName = 'Class Hierarchy' |
  noDataMessage = 'There is currently no information about the class hierarchy available. Please calculate VoID statistics using the button above for collecting the necessary information.'
 }}

== Properties by range and domain ==

The table below lists all properties by their range and domain.

{{
#widget: TableResult
  | query='SELECT ?Property ?Domain ?Range WHERE {
        <http://www.fluidops.com/AllContext> void:propertyPartition ?propertyPartition .
        ?propertyPartition void:property ?Property . 
      OPTIONAL { ?Property rdfs:range ?Range } 
      OPTIONAL { ?Property rdfs:domain ?Domain } }'
}}

== Context Overview ==

This table gives an overview of all available contexts. Contexts are used to group data internally from specific sources, e.g. a single context can contain data obtained form a provider run, a wiki edit, an imported RDF file and so on. Click on an entry in the ''Context'' column to browse this specific context.

{{ #widget: com.fluidops.iwb.widget.ContextEditTableWidget }}
